content.p: VLAN enables you to completely isolate servers and interconnects when you create a VLAN on the enclosure management network. Devices that are not on the same VLAN domain network (VLAN IDs are different) are not able to communicate with each other. All multi-blade servers must be on the same VLAN.
The VLAN Control tab displays the active configuration that is currently in use on the Onboard Administrator.

If changes have been made to the VLAN configuration a Saved Configuration section is displayed. To permanently save the new settings, click Save. If you do not want to save the changed configuration, click Revert.
